name: Lazer Tag Battle Field Champs
description:
Rejoice The Fun Of Fancy Battlegrounds In A Fun Packed Royal Battle, Hook Yourselves With The Ultimate Challenges Of A Lethal Shooting Competition In Fantastic Modes Of One Of The Best Laser Gun Shooting Games.
This extreme shooter game lets you play in three fantastical modes of action sports 3D game adventure battlegrounds:

LASER SHOOTER BATTLE:
Keep the pistol grip tight, Get the experience of extreme shooter game in the laser gun sniper arena. Aim the laser gun on your opponents and kill the suggested rivals. Rifleman! You will Upgrade on level progression.

ULTIMATE SHOOTING COMPETITION:
Feel the heat of royal battle, become the lone survivor to live with the most points in laser gun shooter battlegrounds. Point the field gun on as many surviving opponents as you can. Thrill as a sniper killer to win!

TEAM DEATH MATCH:
The more, the merrier! Team up against the arena shooters in shooting combat battlegrounds and defeat them in an ultimate shoot competition.

Laser Tag Battle Arena Features:
• Be The Best Player In This Unique Field Of Combat
• Experience Gun Fight Like Paintball Arena Challenge: Survivor Shooter Battle
• 3 Modes Of Game Play
• Battle Arena Free For All Mode
• Level Progression Mode
• TDM For Matches In Team
• 3d Graphics And Amazing Environment
• Fun Sounds In The Game of gunners
• Realistic Physics Of Lone Survivor Battle
